# GitHub Copilot Instructions

See [AGENTS.md](../AGENTS.md) for complete project instructions.

## Key Files

- `AGENTS.md` - Full AI agent instructions (industry standard)
- `PROJECT.md` - Project goals and tech stack
- `.doyaken/manifest.yaml` - Project configuration
- `.doyaken/tasks/` - Task management

## Quick Reference

- Prompts: `.doyaken/prompts/library/`
- Skills: `.doyaken/skills/`
- Phases: `.doyaken/prompts/phases/`
